summary.Title: Warehouse Workers for full or part time in Køge
summary.JobHeadline: Warehouse Workers for full or part time in Køge
summary.Presentation:
Job nr. 171121
Are you looking for work where you have the opportunity to choose your working days? Then we have an active and flexible job for you in Køge.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse Workers for full or part time in Køge
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job nr. 171121

Are you looking for work where you have the opportunity to choose your working days? Then we have an active and flexible job for you in Køge.

About the job

As a future warehouse worker at Netto Centrallager in Køge, you will be part of a workplace where there is a good atmosphere and a free tone of voice among the employees. Your work primarily consists of preparing goods for distribution by picking and packing goods and distributing these on pallets. The work is carried out in a large warehouse and by using Pick-by-voice. You need to be prepared for working in temperatures down to 7 degrees.

When you start, you will be thoroughly trained.

Your profile

You must be able to handle a physically demanding job and appreciate the combination of doing a good job while using your body. In addition, you must like to work independently, and you take pride in meeting on time. The working days are busy and therefore it is important that you can work efficiently and thoroughly without compromising on quality. It is an advantage if you have experience from a similar job, but it is not a requirement. The most important thing is that you are open and flexible in relation to the work tasks and have a positive attitude.

In addition, we expect you to:

  • Be flexible in terms of working hours.
  • Have a positive mindset and interested in maintaining the great work environment.
  • Like hard physical work.
  • Be able to read and communicate in English.

 

Practical information

Working hours are primarily in the period 7.00-15.00 Monday to Sunday. You must be able to work at least 2 Saturdays and / or Sundays a month, as these are the busiest days. Alternatively, it is also possible for you to only get weekend shifts if it fits better into your everyday life.

 

After the training, shift plans will be made on a weekly basis.

The basic salary is DKK 125,93 per hour. In addition, there will be bonus depending on performance.

If you do not have a car, you can take the bike on the train to Ølby Station and cycle from there. Alternatively, you can take bus 242 from Ølby Station to the warehouse. Thus, there is a good opportunity to get to the warehouse by public transport.

 

Are you interested?

If you’re interested in the position, we recommend that you send your application immediately. We hire on an ongoing basis.

We’re looking forward to hearing from you.
